metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9998 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The _dwarf_decode_s_leb128_chk function in dwarf_leb.c in libdwarf through 2017-06-28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentation fault) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-9998` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20180129-1
libdwarf1 - 20180129-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
